name: Color?
description:
Hey I'm Djeden, I made this game because I like programming. I made this game in 5 days for the Tenjam. The reason I had 5 days is because I joined 2 days late. Participating to the gamejam was amazing and I really enjoyed working on my game. I learned many new things while participating to this gamejam. I really want to improve this game to make it an actual game because now it only has 3 levels.

Controls:

A - move right

D - move left

Jump - spacebar

Click - shoot

Drop a weapon - Q

Credits:

All sprites in this game are made by me except for the guns.

Thanks for playing or took a look at this page!
